concept.title: For more information (processing)
concept.shortdesc: Additional sources of information for the processing (building) section of this document.

prolog.author: Anna van Raaphorst
Richard Johnson
prolog.publisher: OASIS (Organization for the Advancement of Structured Information Standards)

conbody.p: We found the O'Reilly Java series book, Ant: The Definitive Guide, by Steve Holzner, useful in helping us work through processing problems as we produced this document.
